verses.verse: A <S%H4820>false<s%> <S%H3976>balance<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but <S%H8003>accurate<s%> <S%H68>weights<s%> are his <S%H7522>delight.<s%>
When <S%H2087>pride<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> then <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H7036>shame,<s%> but with humility <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
The <S%H8538>integrity<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H5148>guide<s%> <S%H5558>them,<s%> but the perverseness of the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> shall destroy <S%H7703>them.<s%>
<S%H1952>Riches<s%> <S%H3276>don't<s%> profit in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> but <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5337>delivers<s%> from <S%H4194>death.<s%>
The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H8549>blameless<s%> will <S%H3474>direct<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by his own <S%H7564>wickedness.<s%>
The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H898>them,<s%> but the unfaithful will be <S%H3920>trapped<s%> by evil <S%H1942>desires.<s%>
When a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4194>dies,<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%> <S%H6>perishes,<s%> and <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of <S%H205>power<s%> comes to <S%H6>nothing.<s%>
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> person is delivered <S%H2502>out<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> takes his <S%H7563>place.<s%>
With his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> the <S%H2611>godless<s%> man <S%H7843>destroys<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> but the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H2502>delivered<s%> through <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
When it goes <S%H2898>well<s%> with the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> <S%H5970>rejoices.<s%> When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6>perish,<s%> there is <S%H7440>shouting.<s%>
By the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright,<s%> the <S%H7176>city<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> but it is <S%H2040>overthrown<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
One who <S%H936>despises<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>wisdom,<s%> but a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> holds his <S%H2790>peace.<s%>
One who brings <S%H1980>gossip<s%> <S%H1540>betrays<s%> a <S%H5475>confidence,<s%> but one who is of a <S%H539>trustworthy<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is one who <S%H3680>keeps<s%> a <S%H1697>secret.<s%>
Where there is no wise <S%H8458>guidance,<s%> the <S%H5971>nation<s%> <S%H5307>falls,<s%> but in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H3289>counselors<s%> there is <S%H8668>victory.<s%>
He who is <S%H6148>collateral<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> will <S%H7321>suffer<s%> for <S%H8130>it,<s%> but he who refuses pledges of <S%H8628>collateral<s%> is <S%H982>secure.<s%>
A <S%H2580>gracious<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8551>obtains<s%> <S%H3519>honor,<s%> but <S%H6184>violent<s%> men <S%H8551>obtain<s%> <S%H6239>riches.<s%>
The <S%H2617>merciful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> does <S%H1580>good<s%> to his own <S%H5315>soul,<s%> but he who is <S%H394>cruel<s%> <S%H5916>troubles<s%> his own <S%H7607>flesh.<s%>
<S%H7563>Wicked<s%> people <S%H6213>earn<s%> <S%H8267>deceitful<s%> <S%H6468>wages,<s%> but one who <S%H2232>sows<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> reaps a <S%H571>sure<s%> <S%H7938>reward.<s%>
He who is truly <S%H6666>righteous<s%> gets <S%H2416>life.<s%> He who <S%H7291>pursues<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> gets <S%H4194>death.<s%>

Those who are <S%H6141>perverse<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but those whose <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H8549>blameless<s%> are his <S%H7522>delight.<s%>
<S%H3027>Most<s%> <S%H3027>certainly,<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> man will not be <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> but the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H4422>delivered.<s%>
Like a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5141>ring<s%> in a <S%H2386>pig<s%>'s <S%H639>snout,<s%> is a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> who <S%H5493>lacks<s%> <S%H2940>discretion.<s%>
The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is only <S%H2896>good.<s%> The <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>
There <S%H3426>is<s%> one who <S%H6340>scatters,<s%> and <S%H3254>increases<s%> yet <S%H3476>more.<s%> There is one who withholds more than is appropriate, but gains <S%H4270>poverty.<s%>
The <S%H1293>liberal<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be made <S%H1878>fat.<s%> He who <S%H7301>waters<s%> shall be watered also <S%H3384>himself.<s%>
<S%H3816>People<s%> <S%H5344>curse<s%> someone who <S%H4513>withholds<s%> <S%H1250>grain,<s%> but <S%H1293>blessing<s%> will be on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him who sells <S%H7666>it.<s%>
He who diligently <S%H7836>seeks<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7836>seeks<s%> <S%H7522>favor,<s%> but he who <S%H1875>searches<s%> after <S%H7451>evil,<s%> it shall come to <S%H935>him.<s%>
He who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in his <S%H6239>riches<s%> will <S%H5307>fall,<s%> but the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> as the green <S%H5929>leaf.<s%>

He who <S%H5916>troubles<s%> his own <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H7307>wind.<s%> The <S%H191>foolish<s%> shall be <S%H5650>servant<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%> He who is <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3947>wins<s%> <S%H5315>souls.<s%>
<S%H6662>Behold,<s%> the righteous shall be <S%H7999>repaid<s%> in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> how much more the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and the <S%H2398>sinner!<s%>
